title: Why OpenAI needs to raise equity, and 'a lot of it'
full_text: Why OpenAI needs to raise equity, and 'a lot of it'. The Wall Street Journal reported that Amazon (AMZN) is in talks to invest up to $50 billion in AI giant OpenAI (OPAI.PVT).Freedom Capital Markets managing.... I got to ask you Paul about these reports that Amazon is in talks to invest 50 billion dollars in open AI. So I mean it feels almost like another day, another one of these investments. We haven't had… [+1260 chars]
